exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="downBtnSkin"
        states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" width="84"
        height="82" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="btn1" source="down1_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="1" includeIn="up,down,disabled" source.up="down_png" source.down="down_png" source.disabled="down_png"/>
	<e:Image id="btn" source="down_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="1" includeIn="upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" source.upAndSelected="down1_png" source.downAndSelected="down1_png" source.disabledAndSelected="down1_png"/>

</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="offectOnOffSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" width="152" height="68"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="btn1" source="btn_sound_down_png" includeIn="up,down,disabled" verticalCenter="0" x="72"/>
	<e:Image id="btn2" source="btn_sound_png" height="64" includeIn="upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected"  horizontalCenter="34" verticalCenter="1"/>
	<e:Label text="{label}" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" horizontalCenter="-39" verticalCenter="1" size="14" textColor="0x02070D"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="leftBtnSkin"
        states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" width="84"
        height="82" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="btn" source="left1_png"  horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="1" includeIn="up,down,disabled" />
	<e:Image id="btn1" source="left_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="1" includeIn="upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="musicOnOffSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" width="152"
        height="68" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="btn1" source="btn_music_down_png" x="72" includeIn="up,down,disabled" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="btn2" source="btn_music_png" x="64" y="0" verticalCenter="1" includeIn="upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" height="64" horizontalCenter="34"/>
	<e:Label text="{label}" x="8" y="16" horizontalCenter="-39" verticalCenter="1" size="14" textColor="0x02070D"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="myBtnSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" width="166" height="56"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="btn1" source="btn1_normal_png" height="42" width="134" includeIn="up,down,disabled" horizontalCenter="1.5" verticalCenter="1.5"/>
	<e:Image id="btn2" source="btn1_down_png" height="42" width="134" includeIn="upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected"  x="18" y="9"/>
	<e:Label id="btnLabel" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" height="35" text="{label}" size="30"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="rightBtnSkin"
        states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" width="84"
        height="82" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="btn1" source="right1_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="1" includeIn="up,down,disabled"/>
	<e:Image id="btn" source="right_png" x="18" y="27" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="1" includeIn="upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="topBtnSkin"
        states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" width="84"
        height="82" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="btn" source="up1_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="1" includeIn="upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected"/>
	<e:Image id="btn1" source="up_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="1" includeIn="up,down,disabled"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="StartSkin" width="800" height="480" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="bgover_png" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Image source="sc4arc1_png" x="73" y="83" width="98" height="88"/>
	<e:Image id="sc4wheel2" x="60" y="110" source="sc4wheel2_png" width="96" height="95"  anchorOffsetX="48" anchorOffsetY="47.5"/>
	<e:Image id="sc4wheel1" x="126" y="170" source="sc4wheel1_png" width="53" height="53" anchorOffsetX="26.5" anchorOffsetY="26.5" />
	<e:ToggleButton id="again"  label="Again" x="426" y="382" skinName="myBtnSkin" />
	<e:ToggleButton id="back" label="Back" x="245" y="384" skinName="myBtnSkin"/>
	<e:Label id="titleLabel" text="得分" x="230" y="116" width="136" textColor="0xFF0000" fontFamily="Arial Black" bold="true" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Label id="scoreLabel" x="271" y="159" text="0" size="20" fontFamily="Arial Black" bold="true" textColor="0xF1F90C" textAlign="center"  width="52"/>
	<e:Label id="chenghaoLabel" text="初出茅庐" x="244" y="198" textColor="0xFF0000" fontFamily="Arial Black" bold="true" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Label  x="176" text="历史最高分："  y="281" size="25" textColor="0xFF0000" fontFamily="Arial Black" bold="true"/>
	<e:Label id="scoreMaxLabel" textColor="0x0021FF" text="0" textAlign="center" width="52" size="20" x="10" horizontalCenter="-45" y="287"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="gameUiSkin" width="800" height="480" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="alertBg_png" x="-2" y="-4" height="576" width="245" horizontalCenter="-293" verticalCenter="-2"/>
	<e:Image source="bg2_png" x="1" y="-3"/>
	<e:Image id="gameMap" source="ground_jpg" x="242" y="26" width="540" height="420" horizontalCenter="108" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="wall1" source="wall_02_png" rotation="90" horizontalCenter="-175" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="wall2" source="wall_02_png"  horizontalCenter="118" height="30" y="451"/>
	<e:Image id="wall3" source="wall_02_png" horizontalCenter="118" verticalCenter="-225.5" height="31"/>
	<e:Image id="wall4" source="wall_02_png"  rotation="90" horizontalCenter="392" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Label text="分数：" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" horizontalCenter="-293" verticalCenter="-189" bold="true" strokeColor="0x030200" stroke="0.5" textColor="0xC68712"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="score" x="143" y="17" font="font_fnt" text="0"/>
	<e:ToggleButton id="upbtn" x="60" y="313">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="up1_png" source.down="up_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:ToggleButton id="leftbtn" y="358" x="0">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="left1_png" source.down="left_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:ToggleButton id="downbtn" x="60" y="403">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="down1_png" source.down="down_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:ToggleButton id="rightbtn" x="123" y="357">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="right1_png" source.down="right_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:Group x="19" y="126">
		<e:Label y="4.015151515151558" textColor="0x0602F5" text="当前关卡：" width="136" height="23" x="0" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="20" bold="true"/>
		<e:Label id="speedInfo" y="0" textColor="0x000000" x="112.95454545454545" width="71" text="1"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Label id="tipsInfo" y="162" height="38" fontFamily="微软雅黑" bold="true" width="197" size="20" x="12" textColor="0xFF0004"/>
	<e:Label text="时间：" x="7" y="226" textColor="0x0602F5" size="20" bold="true" width="64" height="24" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
	<e:Label id="timesInfo" x="62" y="221" width="134" fontFamily="微软雅黑" bold="true"  textColor="0xFF0004" height="33" text="00:00:00"/>
	<e:Image source="snakeGirl_png" x="-12" y="-12" width="100" height="146"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="loadingSkin" width="800" height="480" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="loadingbg" source="loading_jpg" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Image id="gamename" source="name_png" horizontalCenter="15.5" verticalCenter="-83.5"/>
	<e:Image id="loadingbarbg" source="loadingbarbg_png" horizontalCenter="23.5" verticalCenter="151.5" height="27"/>
	<e:Image id="loadingbarpic" source="loadingbarpic_png" height="22" verticalCenter="151" width="0" x="149"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="myPanelSkin" width="400" height="300" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="alertBg_png" x="22" y="7"/>
	<e:Image id="panelBtn" source="acceptBtn_png" x="180" y="230"/>
	<e:EditableText id="panelText1" width="295" height="126" x="55" y="40" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left" multiline="true" size="14" textColor="0x02070D"/>
	<e:EditableText id="panelText2" width="258" height="67" x="75" y="136" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" multiline="true" size="14" textColor="0x02070D"/>
	<e:ToggleButton id="music" label="背景音乐:" x="41" y="74" skinName="musicOnOffSkin"/>
	<e:ToggleButton id="effect" label="游戏音效：" x="200" y="78" skinName="offectOnOffSkin"/>

</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="rankPanelSkin" width="400" height="300" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="alertBg_png" x="22" y="7"/>
	<e:Image id="panelBtn" source="acceptBtn_png" x="180" y="230"/>
	<e:EditableText id="panelText1" width="295" height="126" x="55" y="40" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" multiline="true" size="30" textColor="0x02070D"/>
	<e:Label text="历史最高分为：" textAlign="center" horizontalCenter="-17" verticalCenter="-84" bold="true" strokeColor="0x030200" stroke="0.5" size="34" textColor="0x000000" fontFamily="Arial Black" height="46"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="score" x="176" y="88" font="font_fnt" text="0" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="StartSkin" width="800" height="480" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="startbg_png" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Image source="name_png" x="553" y="-23"/>
	<e:Image source="snakeIcon_png" x="322" y="102" width="216" height="246"/>
	<e:ToggleButton id="setting" label="Setting" x="426" y="382" skinName="myBtnSkin" />
	<e:ToggleButton id="startGame" label="Start" x="245" y="384" skinName="myBtnSkin"/>
	<e:ToggleButton id="rank" label="Rank" x="57" y="384" skinName="myBtnSkin"/>
	<e:ToggleButton id="help" label="Help" x="608" y="381" skinName="myBtnSkin"/>
</e:Skin>
